elements.name: User verifies product names in the search results

steps.name: the user is on the Flipkart website
the user types "vivo t3x" in the search bar and clicks "Search"
the search results should show relevant products
the first product's name should be similar to the search word "vivo t3x"

elements.name: User verifies product names in the search results

steps.name: the user is on the Flipkart website
the user types "samsung s10" in the search bar and clicks "Search"
the search results should show relevant products
the first product's name should be similar to the search word "samsung s10"
